body_html:
No, I installed numpy directly from source, and it is located in the right directory. The directory tree to the file the installer can't find is as follows:

/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy/core/include/numpy/arrayobject.h

body:
No, I installed numpy directly from source, and it is located in the right directory. The directory tree to the file the installer can't find is as follows:

```
/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy/core/include/numpy/arrayobject.h

```
